mapper.select: SELECT CRUD_ID, CRUD_SJ, USER_NM, date_format(FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM FROM LETCRUD ORDER BY CRUD_ID DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LETCRUD (CRUD_ID, CRUD_SJ, CRUD_CN, USER_NM, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM) VALUES ( #{crudId}, #{crudSj}, #{crudCn}, #{userNm}, NOW() )
